title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 93.2 - Liquor containers delivered in room service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 93.2 - Liquor containers delivered in room service

State Regulations
(a) In furnishing room service, no licensee
shall use, or dispense from, or deliver a container exceeding one-half gallon
of liquor or more than 15 gallons of wine, nor use or deliver a container of
less than 25 ounces of liquor or six ounces of wine except that containers of
liquor containing two ounces or less may be delivered exclusively in the
furnishing of room service. (b) As
used in the context of this section, the term containermeans the original
sealed bottle or package as received by the hotel licensee from the
wholesaler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

93.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
